function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate calculations of building areas and capacities","Impact":"Misinformed decision-making and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Conduct regular audits and verification of building area and capacity data","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM) software for accurate measurements","People":"Facility managers, architects, and urban planners","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Incorrect percentage calculations for circulation and services areas","Impact":"Misleading representation of space allocation and usage","Mitigation":"Implement standardized calculation methods and verify equations","Technologies":"Space planning software for accurate space allocation calculations","People":"Facility managers, architects, and urban planners","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of percentages for car parking and circulation areas","Impact":"Inaccurate planning and utilization of parking and circulation spaces","Mitigation":"Clarify and verify the definitions and boundaries of parking and circulation areas","Technologies":"Parking management systems for accurate parking area measurements","People":"Facility managers, parking planners, and architects","Owner":"Facility management team"}]}
